Welcome to the Boondocks 

The goal is to open a creative, family friendly,  space to expand my growing photography business in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan (right on the border of Canada.) 
I am based in Sault Ste. Marie, MI and for over 10 years I have been in the graphic design/layout/editing/photo journalism/newspaper industry. Photography was always put on the back burner for this "career" path. 
Changes in this industry and for my family have led me to a fork in the road. This campaign is important to me because it will help me more easily pick the road less traveled and finally do something I have wanted to do for years, open a portrait studio.
The space will also be used as a store front for my hand made photo props and custom kids hats and children's accessories which is part of how I started on this path. 4 years ago when I needed models for my Boondocks Babies Hat Shop online store on Etsy. I used my photography skills to photograph the products. Esty listings with models always sold better. I loved interacting with the newborns and the new moms on these shoots. This part time gig turned into shooting families, children, couples and bigger shoots. One of the perks is a huge discount on these custom hats. 



Perks:Some of the perks to pick from include: Limited edition prints (many never before printed or sold before, see some of the options below); Be the first in the new studio if you pick one of the discounted photo sessions; Made to order, handmade newborn photo props, kids hats and winter hats for adults/kids all at a discounted price that will never happen again (very limited number). The big one is "Name the main studio" perk where you can choose the name of the main studio. For this one your name, or the name/nickname, you choose will be placed on the door and will be referred to daily. (Catch: Name must be family friendly but could be in the name of someone, a funny catch phrase, or simply named after you, your pick.) 
Plus if you live in the EUP you can take advantage of the fall family session deal!
  Where the funds will go: 

I have found a beautiful place to rent in historic downtown of Sault Ste. Marie, check (see photos below); basic equipment and cameras, check; clients and word of mouth, check. 85% of what I need to start are ready to go. While I have loved working exclusively on location the time has come for me to have my own space. 
There is snow on the ground almost 7 months out of the year here, Sault Ste. Marie was named one of the "snowiest" places in the nation. This alone is one of the most important reasons why I need a climate controlled place for clients. 

 - Remodel: Paint, floor cleaning, etc. 
- Equipment: Backdrop system, some extra props. 
-  Marketing: So far my brand has been moving forward with social media and word of mouth. Which has been perfect because I have only been doing this part time. To move forward into full time I need a bigger welcome mat. My location would be right downtown, has amazing light but I will need new signage and marketing to let me know I am open. 
  Risks: 
  The bulk of the planning, funding, and equipment are already in place, the location has been found, and my client base has been growing steadily and I feel strongly that this will be successful. Any challenges that arise will be handled with my creative, strong-willed perseverance and solutions will be found. The fact that I keep losing clients due to the fact I don't have an indoor studio gives me hope that once I am set up my business will only continue to grow. Any funds raised above and beyond the amount requested will only help speed up my growth, going toward equipment upgrades and any unexpected expenses.
  Thank you for reading, feel free to share
Word of mouth is everything. Any help you can give with spreading the word will do more then you think. Facebook: Boondocks Portrait StudioWeb: boondocksbabies.comTwitter:@boondocksbabiesInstagram: boondocksbabieshatshop

story:
I grew up in Bern between two worlds: the Italian and Swiss culture. The love I have for music, I discovered when I first started playing the classical piano. During that time I was fascinated by the sound and movement of my voice between different music genres; pop, rock and jazz. From different music bands i was engaged as a keyboard player and singer for various concerts in Switzerland and live on the radio.

Through these first experiences I discovered my passion for singing. Later various engagements in the pop-rock and electro / trip-hop scene led me to have live and studio projects. Always fascinated by the music and philosophy of jazz, I decided to further develop musically. In Lucerne and Winterthur, I studied at the music academies. What I studied was jazz singing, composition and arranging. As a jazz singer I performed in various jazz and gospel formations. As individual artist,  I try to remains authentic. To be a musician I perceive as a real being. Music is the spiritual expression of what I am - my faith, my knowledge, my essence.

What Does Music Mean to Me

Music has always been my life, I grew up surrounded by music and always felt a strong connection with it. Music helped me understand who I am and it always made me feel better when I was going through hard times. I started to sing when I was 17 and discovered that there were ways of expressing myself that I had never seen before. I became confident and slowly started to write my own songs to this day on. Music is everything to me, it is my soul, my thought, my essence, my everything. To me, music is one of the greatest things ever created and will always stay in the world of music, because it is who I am. Music is me and I am music.

What We Need & What You Get

There is a breakdown of the budget. This amount generated will cover the cost of:

  • Recording, arranging, mixing, mastering, artwork, manufacturing and distributing the project (the album). 
  • Musicians
  • Basic PR & marketing

Check out the many perks there are for donating; including merchandise, Skype calls, vocal lessons and  performances.


The Impact

The impact this project will have in the world will be big. With the album 'FLY', people will be able to feel free and have a deeper understanding of themselves and what is around them. Onda Magica aims to flow, to be magical, to be a powerful experience that will revolutionize the Jazz world.

Risks & Challenges

Some of the challenges we face with this project are quite hard at times, but we believe in the movement so we push ourselves to the maximum.
We have to work with various individuals such as the producer, and when you depend on someone else to edit the song, it can take a week or it can take months. That slows us down the most but we just keep writing songs in the mean time.
We have lived in the music world for many years now and we know who and what to talk about. We love it, and when you are so passionate about something, you never stop. That is why we believe in this project so much and we know we will be able to complete it.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate that's okay, you can help us in other ways!!

SHARE the campaign on all the social media sites and spread the word! The more people know about it, the better the project will go.

REMEMBER, use the Indiegogo share tools to do this.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Years of experience come together in new power band SMOKE HOLLOW with members John Exall, Dewey Bragg, Ashes, and Ralf Mueggler who are currently recording their debut album. With over half of the record finished the ever rising recording costs have caught up with us..........and now we need your help to finish.


With your generous and much appreciated contributions, you will help with the studio costs along with producer/sound engineer rates. Also, when finished with recording, your donations will help mix and master the final product so we can get new rock/n roll music to your ears. 

With a collective resume encompassing Texas Hippie Coalition, Kill Devil Hill, and Static-X, this quartet will undoubtedly give passionate, powerful and PURE heavy music. And with the experience and dedication that all of the members have obviously shown in the past, you can guarantee that Smoke Hollow is the real deal and will be making music for a long time.

YOU the fans are the only reason any of us can do what we do and hopefully with the completion of this album we can return the favor to you. Take a look at the perks we have to offer. Thank you and don't worry if you can not contribute,  you can still help out by sharing this page with all of your friends and family.

Thank you again from the bottom of our hearts in taking the time to look through this campaign!!!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • My name is Aaron Springel from Staunton VA, I am a passionate rap artist that has been producing music for 4 years.
  • I have been working for a long time to further my rap career since my brother got locked up and my dad got sick as a way to help my family at the same time follow my dreams of becoming a recognized artist.
  • Our contributors would help pay for allotted studio as well as purchasing studio equipment for home use as well as travel/business expenses for performances.


What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • The contributors money would go towards paying for the artists promotion with the media as well as expenses for studio time and equipment.
  • I have always had a very creative imagination which is one of the things that fuels my rap focus and career.I'm not in the business of getting famous i just love music and the positive effect it can have on people
  • Regardless of whether I get 1$ or the 3500$ i've asked my contributors for I will be spending it towards furthering my rap career.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • All contributors will receive an autographed mixtape as well as 22-1 ent poster. Our musical goal is to promote diversity in the rap community.
  • I have made 3 Videos and 1 with a well known artist.
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uDAxatdegIw 12Gauge(ME)
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RZEb5yAy5T0 12 Gauge(ME)
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TL-wVBlIywo 12 Gauge (ME)

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • I'm a hard working individual with connections to various artists and promotion teams for filming videos and music features with other rap artists.
  • I will work my hardest and never stop trying to achieve my musical dream, there is nothing in this world that could stop my ambition and drive to create a musical following.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • I would greatly appreciate anyone sharing my videos or even mentioning a song to friends.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hi Peeps,

I’m Scott, a Canadian songwriter, producer, artist and musician. I was previously in the band “The Moffatts” back in the 90’s and have since been producer of the year and worked all over the world on several projects (IRIS out of Montreal, Slot Machine out of Thailand). This is my first release since 2006’s Allegory of the City (recorded in Los Angeles). 

This campaign is to get my new Ep released, make the first single’s music video and get a Canadian tour set up. I feel more than ever that this music at least needs a chance to be heard. I feel there’s lots of value in these songs and the time and effort put in has been absolutely worth it. 

With your help this music can be heard on a large scale. I have no doubts. The songs are current, but seem to have something else that I’m not hearing much of these days. You could be playing a huge role in determining the way music is listened to for generations to come. Bringing back the heart in music one artist at a time. 

I can do all of this with 30,000 dollars: I have an awesome radio plugger in Toronto (Dale Speaking) and know several great publicists that can get awesome articles like this one on Noisey (these numbers add up since they’re on a salary and it takes several months to work a single). I’ll need to be able to get to shows and survive while getting there. Also, pay the drummer, even though some of you might not think he/she deserves it. Completing the video takes time and money and mixing the remaining songs also takes a chunk of cash. Mixes can run from 500-1000 a song and mastering at least 100 a song. Studio time to track vocals with high quality gear (mic and preamps make a difference and I don’t have very good ones) and in a real nice room. My bedroom currently records ambulances and 18 wheeler trucks better than my vocal. Below is a bullet-point outline of expenses:

  1. For studio time to track my vocals with high quality gear and room.
  2. To mix and master the remaining songs. 
  3. Complete the first video which takes money.
  4. Radio plugger in Toronto for two singles on Canadian radio (if you know people in other country that can help - I'm all ears!) 
  5. To pay great publicists.
  6. To start the tour and to survive between shows. 
  7. To pay a drummer. 

There’s lots of cool perks when you contribute to this campaign. Credits in my artwork to writing songs with me via Skype that could even make my next Ep. I’m Without You and Distract Me are all songs going on this Ep that I wrote with fans from Germany, Los Angeles, the Philippines and numerous other locations. That’s all an investment that will eventually pay off. It's also a great experience hanging out and being creative together. Here's a bullet-point outline of prizes:

5$ - A personal email saying thanks

10$ - Your name on my wall of FAME!!!

15$ - 3 songs from Ep before anyone else

25$ - A thank you credit in Ep artwork plus 3 songs from Ep before anyone else

50$ - Personal Skype thank you, credit in Ep artwork and first to receive complete new Ep

150$ - Cook and have dinner over Skype, credit in Ep artwork, plus digital copies of previously unreleased material and first to receive complete new Ep

300$ - Write a song with me via Skype with the possibility of making next Ep 

500$ - Write a song with me via Skype with the possibility of making next Ep and receive professional recording of song

1,000$ - Write a song with me via Skype with the possibility of making next Ep, get listed as executive producer of EP, collaborate on track list order and receive 1% royalty from sales of Ep


If the goal isn’t reached then I’ll still use whatever is made. I’m not giving up on this and any help is appreciated. 

I don’t write songs just for the sake of writing songs. Its a very important experience and should be fun, but not taken for granted. Its a great way to communicate and inspire people. Even though being successful is an important thing to me, it doesn’t take precedence over the art form and that’s something that separates me from a lot of the artists today. This is your opportunity to make a difference. To show the world that you don’t have to write a fluffy lyric to be successful. Take things back to when Michael Jackson spoke about things that mattered. Change the course being set for people that come after us and after them. If its gonna happen, its gotta happen now. 

I’ve already sold over 6 million records with my previous band “The Moffatts” which was the most successful pop band to come out of Canada in the 90’s and early 2000’s. I’ve been nominated for numerous awards and have a track record for completing and doing my best on everything I do. This is a goal of mine and I am not about to give up now.

I believe this is a risk free project. I’ve made up my mind to make this happen and to not give up until it has, but there will be obstacles…and I like obstacles. Its the only time I learn anything…and I like learning. They constantly test my character and intelligence. 

Please spread the word and help me get this music heard through social media and emails.  Share, share, share if you can. That’s ultimately the most important part. If you can’t help financially, anything will work. Thanks for taking the time, cause I know there’s always something else to do. 

Scott

story:
Let's Co-Create Two New Albums Of Magical Healing Music 

YOU can be a part of creating Ali Maya's upcoming studio and sound journey albums:

  • I'm Eleanor Tara, one of Ali Maya's many musical co-creators and supporters. I can't wait for her to record her TWO new albums so I can listen to them all the time - and I know I'm not alone! 

Here's What We're Making

  • One album is Ali's second studio release, a collection of original songs. 
  • The other album is a sound journey in collaboration with some of Ali's favorite musicians. 
  • Special musical guests on these albums include myself, Lauren Arrow, Annie May, Robbie Ryan, Murray Kyle, Mary Isis, Idan Meyer, and many other magical beings!

What You'll be Contributing To:

  • Ali creates her music as a generous heart offering of healing to the world, and the costs of making the albums far exceed the amount she receives in sales revenue. Therefore, she needs your support to make these new albums happen in short order!
  • By contributing to this campaign you will be participating in the planetary healing that is so dear to Ali's heart, transmitted clearly through each and every note. And if that's not enough, we've got some truly incredible perks to offer you a gesture of our deep gratitude.

What We Need & What You Get

The details:

  • Each album will cost $10,000 to record, engineer, produce, mix and master. These funds will go directly to the studio costs.
  • Perks include the albums itself, as well as opportunities to experience Ali Maya's musical and healing magic in a unique, private setting.
  • If we don't reach our final goal, don't fret - the funds will go toward recording as much of the albums as possible for the amount raised.

Other Ways You Can Help


What else you can do:

  • Help us to get the word out! Share this campaign over email, on social media, or anywhere else you are inspired to post it.
  • For your convenience, Indiegogo has sharing tools you can use.

Thank you so much! 

Infinite gratitude to you...

story:
WHO IS mwseq™?

mwseq™ is Music for SuperFans™ PAYING ARTISTS. FIRST!™ At mwseq™, we are Re-Creating digital music streaming.  Our Movement is on the Leading Edge of the New Music Industry Revolution. We power a proprietary Recipe  that is a Tech-driven Engine connecting more SuperFans™ in Up Close and Intimate Fashion to Discover and Support Their Favorite Independent Artists.  To ensure independent and mainstream artists keep making music that SuperFans™ love, mwseq™ re-writes the Rules of Engagement. 

Photo of Ben Rocha courtesy of Herb Staten


mwseq™ enfranchises World-Class Independent and Mainstream Recording Artists to vastly boost their income by connecting them with mwseqSuperFans™.  Our Innovative online tools allow more SuperFans™ to personally relate to Artists who sell exclusive original digital music (all genres) to mwseqSuperFans™. 


Photo of SERMÓNNE™ courtesy of Marcia Gutiérrez


WHAT WE SELL

mwseq™ benefits:

• mwseqSuperFans™ with Up Close Personal Connection with Artists

• Artists with digital distribution of Music for SuperFans™ PAYING ARTISTS. FIRST!™

HOW IT WORKS

• Artists upload original works to the mwseqVault™.  mwseqSuperFans™ stream their favorite Artist’s tracks.  The SuperFan™ Faithfully Connects to her/his Champion Artist for at least $21 monthly. 

• mwseqSuperFans™ download and/or stream, ANY of MILLIONS of mwseqVault™ track(s), video(s), Live Streamed Concerts, VIP Back Stage Passes, VIP Access to Band Rehearsals for one low price. They have access to the music of their much-loved Artrepreneur™, with the option to cancel, at any time, for any reason.

As an added bonus, when SuperFans™ invite friends to mwseq™, the referring party receives immediate credit towards her/his monthly renewal.  SuperFans™ get Exclusive Unlimited streaming videos, concerts and live performances of MILLIONS of tracks of 10,000 Independent Artrepreneurs™ and Mainstream Artists.

 

Photo of Curtis Evans courtesy of Marcia Gutiérrez

HOW WE DIFFER FROM OUR COMPETITION

Competition includes, but is not limited to:

•  Spotify®

•  iTunes

•  TIDAL

•  Pandora® Radio

•  Patreon   

•  Slacker Radio

•  Last.Fm

•  Google Play

•  Amazon

•  CD Baby™

•  ReverbNation®

•  Clear Channel

Competitors, for sure, do one thing: in one form, or another, they sell music. But, when measuring head-to-head, direct competitors, we find that there are none that do exactly what we do. mwseq™ is the first streaming retailer guaranteeing Artists a “livable” income from their digital content. However, there is still significant competition from other online music retailers.

WHAT ARTREPRENEURS™ EARN with mwseq™ v. COMPETITORS

STREAMING

TO EARN $1,257/MONTH

Rhapsody –

over 127,473 Plays

Spotify –

over 4,549,020 Plays

DOWNLOADS;  -

TO EARN $1,257/MONTH

Amazon –

over 13,967 Downloads

iTunes –

over 3,398 Downloads

mwseq™

45 mwseqSuperFans™  (Royalties)

mwseq™ believes it has a significant competitive advantage over competitors because of:

•  Superior mwseqSuperFans™ Benefits

•  Higher Artist Compensation

•  Trademark Protections that Behave Like Patents

•  Revolutionary Business Model

•  Cutting Edge Pricing Policy

Other Competition: mwseq™ knows that as it enters the market and established presence, others will try to follow. However, mwseq™ believes that the corporate mission, the organizational design, the benefits noted above (especially, Trademark Protection), and entrenched industry ethical challenges will work to the benefit of mwseq™ and cause mwseq™ to be very tough to match and difficult to follow.

mwseq™ constantly evaluates products, positioning, service, and corporate mission to ensure that it remains FIRST AS the digital distribution leader that is Music for SuperFans™ PAYING ARTISTS. FIRST!™

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

mwseq™ needs $70,000 for:

•  Market Research/Marketing & Promotions

•  Software

•  Rent, Utilities & Supplies

•  Insurance

•  Web Maintenance/Hosting/Access

•  Travel/Trade Shows

The Perks-

Our Exciting perks include  a 
  • $21 One-Month mwseqSuperFan™
  • $63 Three-Month mwseqSuperFan™
  • $84 Four-Month mwseqSuperFan™
  • $105 Five-Month mwseqSuperFan™
  • $252 One-Year mwseqSuperFan™
  • $504 Two-Year mwseqSuperFan™
  • $1,008 Four-Year mwseqSuperFan™

Photo of Hannah & Austin Massey with Flocks&the Lookout courtesy of Herb Staten


The Impact

Michael Jackson noted in an Oprah interview that Artists Reconnect Humanity with Divinity. At mwseq™ we believe in the Power of Mr. Jackson's statement. In the hook of the hit tune, the singer declares, "Last night a DJ saved my life."  Artists everywhere, everyday are saving lives, bringing healing, humanity and sanity to hearts and minds.  mwseq™ is persuaded that Artists are Purposed with Sacred Work. And, at mwseq™, we are convinced that, because Artists' work is Noble and Healing, they should make a sustainable, respectable living from their Art. mwseq™ seeks to obliterate the poisonous and pervasive myth of the "starving artist" from both the social consciousness and the Artists themselve, because Humanity Needs Artists Like People Need Air™.


Photo of R. Darryl Thomas courtesy of Rodney Wright


INVESTOR RISKS & CHALLENGES

THE PROBLEMS

The “Elephant-in-the-Room" Investor Risks and Challenges that we face are questions of Revenue.  If the only Revenue is from Streaming, that could be a problem. The "Music for SuperFans™ PAYING ARTISTS. FIRST!™ Promise" requires the $21 monthly in order: 

•  for Artists to sleep indoors & eat

•  to cover direct & operating costs of fueling Our Marketing Engine, and

•  to address typical costs of doing business

The market is 280 Million global households.  If the only Revenue is streaming, then we would need to win 70% of the streaming market.


Photo of Sam Hudgens & JD Provitt of SERMÓNNE™ courtesy of Marcia Gutiérrez


THE SOLUTIONS: SuperFans™ & More

Now, in this fast emerging NEW MUSIC INDUSTRY, SuperFans™ are the marketers, preaching the gospel of Artists to potential new fans. Though SuperFans™ make up just 14% of streaming consumers, they drive 34% of market sales. They spend between $250 and $2,500 each annually in support of their Artist. SuperFans™ are the bosses who now control and drive the New Music Industry.

Additionally, 70% market share is not needed, because mwseq™ has over a DOZEN varied Revenue Streams to assure the Artrepreneur™ earnings. The 12+ Streams are the equivalent of bringing a nuclear warhead to a knife fight and don’t want to tip off competitors. The diverse Revenue Streams win access to the developed 2Billion Global Market, as well as the unexplored explosive impact of Billions of prospects in fast developing third world markets. All 12+ of our Revenue Streams is too much information to try and abbreviate here so we merely discuss the Streaming.

What are other solutions? mwseq™ represents a Rare Convergence of Skills. We possess Entrepreneurial Excellence; Performance Art Distinction; and, I. T. Professionalism.


Photo of  Mike Ramsey courtesy of Marcia Gutiérrez

WAYS YOU CAN HELP

•  Please get the word out and make LOTS of noise about our Campaign.

•  Please use the INDIEGOGO Share Tools!

•  Make calls, send email, post on social media.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

story:
I recently took time off from my passion of singing due to the negative feelings that I was beginning to associate with a career in music. During this time I began to uncover my “Inner Demons”. I experienced extreme lows as I began to nitpick at flaws and evaluate whether I was good enough.

With the help of a friend I started to see once again the power music has to heal. He shared with me an amazing song. We had the opportunity to get into the studio and start recording. I shared my scenarios and emotions and we came up with songs that spoke to me and helped me to be open about how I'd been feeling.

I’m in the process of creating an album that chronicles different phases, emotions, and situations that lead to depression and suicide in the hopes of bringing awareness to a heartbreaking and too-common cause. I've recorded 8 songs, but I need your help to fully bring this project to life. I want to take this time to share the lead single off the project entitled "Silent Sirens" which will be release Sep 10th 2015 which marks Suicide Awareness day World wide.

We've honestly lost so many people due to the tragedies of depression, heartbreak and so much more.Please help me to share my heart with you and the world. Music has done so much for me and the drive behind this project has helped me to continue to work to stay grounded. The songs I want to share are a reminder of pain, and hope! It's my journey - A journey I believe so many others have traveled and I can't express how grateful I am to be able to share it with you.

I am creating my project to continue to use my emotions productively and positively instead of burying them within me. I also hope to connect with others who are living with this sort of pain. Thank You.

THANK YOU to the following People and Companies that have helped with this Campaign.

Kay Vision Productions

Miss Jessie's

Worst BestMaker

Tarik Carroll

Eric West

Syhaya Aviel

Steven Mosier Designs

story:
Slovenská verzia >>>

Do you remember the event which was impossible to forget? Let's enjoy 5th Lovely Experience show, this time on city main square for everyone for free! 

Lovely Experience it is the multimedia event introducing modern audiovisual concept. It catches all kinds of visitors and enables you to be a part of the new approach of attracting the attention. 

Lovely Experience will change main square of the Slovak city Trnava into the common place for spending free time together with the art of audiovisual music, dance and acrobatic performances of foreign artists. 

EXPERIENCE it’s the word which defines it all.

When? : Saturday, 7th May 2016
Where? : Trojičné square - Trnava, Slovakia

What? - The event takes place at the square in the city center, including square’s buildings. The show changes Trnava’s square into the modern and stylish place. In the installation there are spherical mirrors, decorations, videomapping, smart lights, surround sounds, pyrotechnic effects, exclusive 3D laser technology, artistic equipment and technologies needed for dancer’s and acrobat’s performances included. Our show will change the square into a huge party and you won’t even recognize it! 

This is our 5th Lovely Experience which gives you chance to enjoy:

  • 5 foreign artists with live electronic music and audiovisual performances
  • more than 50 motion, dance, light and multimedia artists
  • 5 x 50m2 of building videomapping 
  • 5 profesional breathtaking acrobatic performances 
  • 5000 square meters of Lovely Experience
  • +50 special effects and surprises 
  • This time 5th Lovely Experience for everyone and for free! 

You will keep the memories of Lovely Experience for all life! The multimedia show which will take your breath away and will make a deep impression on you.

Background - Our story've begun in 2008. First 2 years was the event organized in the nature nearby Trnava city and after 2 years we've started to grow even faster and faster. In 2010 and 2011 we became partner of the Slovak festival TOPFEST, introducing multimedia stage with foreign artists with artists like ATB, Chicane, Above & Beyond, Kosheen and many more..  We are the civil association, founded by Matúš Izakovič, and our idea is to bring multimedia shows and experiences offering modern audiovisual technologies. We've organized Lovely Experience 4 times before and this time we've prepared something special. We've created unique festival which lets people experience massive party on the Trnava's square - this time for free. This is your unique chance to be part of it. Don't miss it!

Unique concept proven over time.. This time in the iconic venue for everyone and for free! 

Why is your sponsoring important for us and how will we use it?

We are exclusive event funded by 100 % from partners and sponsors. Our innovative approach helps us to create the place for cooperation. We believe in modern technologies! It brings interesting and high quality performances. With you we are ready to make it! 


What if you can't contribute finacially?

If you can't contribute, we would still appreciate your help by sharing our campaign on social media. Tell your friends about us and let the world know about our multimedia show. Get on board!

''Only Lovely Experience enables you to present this....''

We have attracted you, haven’t we? ;)

Visit our webpage: http://www.lovelyexperience.sk/

Find us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/lovely.experience?fref=ts

Let's share Lovely Experience!


Slovensky

Pamätáte sa na show, ktorá bola nezabudnuteľným zážitkom? Poďte si vychutnať 5. ročník Lovely Experience, tento krát v meste na hlavnom námestí a pre všetkých bezplatne!

Lovely Experience je multimediálny event predstavujúci moderný audiovizuálny koncept. Je to šou pre všetkých, ktorá umožnuje návštevníkom byť súčasťou nového umeleckého prístupu a pôsobí na všetky zmysly.

Lovely Experience zmení slovenské mesto Trnava na spoločné miesto zdieľania voľného času pri audiovizuálnom umení, hudbe, tanci a akrobatických vystúpeniach zahraničných umelcov.

ZÁŽITOK, to je slovo, ktoré všetko vystihuje.

Kedy? : Sobota, 7. máj 2016

Kde? : Trojičné námestie – Trnava, Slovensko

Čo? – Event sa koná na hlavnom námestí v centre mesta využívajúc aj budovy na námestí. Lovely Experience zmení námestie Trnavy na moderné a štýlové miesto. Show plná sférických zrkadiel, dekorácií, videomappingu, dychvyrážajúcich svetiel, dynamického surround zvuku, pyrotechnických efektov, exkluzívnej laserovej technológie, umeleckých pomôcok a technológií potrebných pre tanečné a akrobatické vystúpenia. Naša show zmení námestie na obrovskú party, ako ste ho predtým ešte nevideli!

Na 5. ročníku Lovely Experience máte šancu zažiť :

  • 5 zahraničných umelcov so živou elektronickou hudbou a audiovizuálnymi vystúpeniami
  • Viac ako 50 tanečných, vizuálnych a multimediálnych umelcov
  • 5 x 50m2 plochy budovy na videomapping
  • 5 profesionálnych dychvyrážajúcich akrobatických vystúpení
  • Lovely Experience na 5000 m2
  • + 50 špeciálnych efektov a prekvapení
  • Tento krát prinášame 5. ročník Lovely Experience bezplatne pre všetkých!

Svoje zážitky z Lovely Experience si budete pamätať celý život! Multimediálna show, ktorá Vám vyrazí dych a zanechá na Vás obrovský dojem.

História – Náš príbeh začal v roku 2008. Prvé 2 roky sme event organizovali v prírode v okolí mesta Trnava a po 2 rokoch sme začali rásť oveľa rýchlejšie. V roku 2010 a 2011 sme sa stali partnerom slovenského festivalu TOPFEST predstavujúc multimediálny stage prezentujúci zahraničných umelcov ako napr. ATB, Chicane, Above & Beyond, Kosheen, a mnohých ďalších.. Sme občianske združenie, založené Matúšom Izakovičom, a našou myšlienkou je priniesť multimediálnu show a zážitky využívajúc moderné audiovizuálne technológie. Lovely Experience sme organizovali 4x a tento krát sme si pre Vás pripravili niečo špeciálne. Vytvárame jedinečný festival, ktorý umožňuje zažiť obrovskú párty na trnavskom námestí – tento krát bezplatne. Toto je Vaša jedinečná šanca byť jej súčasťou. Nezmeškajte ju!


Prinášame jedinečný koncept overený časom.. Tento krát na kultovom mieste a pre všetkých zadarmo!


Prečo je pre nás Vaša podpora dôležitá a ako vyzbieranú sumu použijeme?

Sme exkluzívny event financovaný 100 % z partnerov a sponzorov. Náš inovatívny prístup nám pomáha vytvoriť priestor pre spoluprácu. Kladieme dôraz na moderné technológie! Prinášajú zaujímavé a vysoko kvalitné vystúpenia. S vami sme pripravení to všetko pripraviť a zvládnuť!


Čo, ak nám nemôžete poskytnúť finančný príspevok?

Ak nás nemôžete podporiť finančne, veľmi oceníme Vašu pomoc, keď budete našu kampaň zdieľať prostredníctvom sociálnych sietí. Povedzte o nás svojim kamarátom a pomôžte nám rozšíriť našu myšlienku multimediálnej show do celého sveta. Pridajte sa k nám!


''Jedine Lovely Experience Vám umožní takto sa prezentovať....''

Zaujali sme Vás, však? ;)

Navštívte náš web: http://www.lovelyexperience.sk/

Pozrite si náš Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lovely.experience?fref=ts


Poďme spolu zdieľať Lovely Experience!

In 2010 and 2011 we became partner of the Slovak festival TOPFEST, introducing multimedia stage with foreign artists with artists like ATB, Chicane, Above & Beyond, Kosheen and many more..  We are the civil association, founded by Matúš Izakovič, and our idea is to bring multimedia shows and experiences offering modern audiovisual technologies. We've organized Lovely Experience 4 times before and this time we've prepared something special. We've created unique festival which lets people experience massive party on the Trnava's square - this time for free. This is your unique chance to be part of it. Don't miss it!

Unique concept proven over time.. This time in the iconic venue for everyone and for free! 









  Why is your sponsoring important for us and how will we use it?
We
are exclusive event funded by 100 % from partners and sponsors. Our innovative
approach helps us to create the place for cooperation. We believe in modern
technologies! It brings interesting and high quality performances. With you we
are ready to make it! 







What if you can't contribute finacially? If you can't contribute, we would still appreciate your help by sharing our campaign on social media. Tell your friends about us and let the world know about our multimedia show. Get on board!

''Only Lovely
Experience enables you to present this....''
We have attracted you, haven’t we? ;)
Visit our webpage: http://www.lovelyexperience.sk/
Find us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/lovely.experience?fref=ts
Let's share Lovely Experience!


Slovensky
Pamätáte sa na show, ktorá bola nezabudnuteľným zážitkom? Poďte si vychutnať 5. ročník Lovely Experience, tento krát v meste na hlavnom námestí a pre všetkých bezplatne!
Lovely Experience je multimediálny event predstavujúci moderný audiovizuálny koncept. Je to šou pre všetkých, ktorá umožnuje návštevníkom byť súčasťou nového umeleckého prístupu a pôsobí na všetky zmysly.
Lovely Experience zmení slovenské mesto Trnava na spoločné miesto zdieľania voľného času pri audiovizuálnom umení, hudbe, tanci a akrobatických vystúpeniach zahraničných umelcov.

ZÁŽITOK, to je slovo, ktoré všetko vystihuje.

Kedy? : Sobota, 7. máj 2016
Kde? : Trojičné námestie – Trnava, Slovensko


Čo? – Event sa koná na hlavnom námestí v centre mesta využívajúc
aj budovy na námestí. Lovely Experience zmení námestie Trnavy na moderné a štýlové
miesto. Show plná sférických zrkadiel, dekorácií, videomappingu, dychvyrážajúcich
svetiel, dynamického surround zvuku, pyrotechnických efektov, exkluzívnej laserovej
technológie, umeleckých pomôcok a technológií potrebných pre tanečné a akrobatické
vystúpenia. Naša show zmení námestie na obrovskú party, ako ste ho predtým ešte
nevideli!

Na 5. ročníku Lovely Experience máte šancu zažiť :




5 zahraničných umelcov so živou elektronickou hudbou a audiovizuálnymi
vystúpeniami


Viac ako 50 tanečných, vizuálnych a multimediálnych umelcov


5 x 50m2 plochy budovy na videomapping



5 profesionálnych dychvyrážajúcich akrobatických vystúpení

Lovely Experience na 5000 m2

+ 50 špeciálnych efektov a prekvapení


Tento krát prinášame 5. ročník Lovely Experience bezplatne
pre všetkých!


Svoje zážitky z Lovely Experience si budete pamätať celý
život! Multimediálna show, ktorá Vám vyrazí dych a zanechá na Vás obrovský
dojem.


História – Náš príbeh začal v roku 2008. Prvé 2 roky
sme event organizovali v prírode v okolí mesta Trnava a po 2
rokoch sme začali rásť oveľa rýchlejšie. V roku 2010 a 2011 sme sa
stali partnerom slovenského festivalu TOPFEST predstavujúc multimediálny stage prezentujúci
zahraničných umelcov ako napr. ATB, Chicane, Above & Beyond, Kosheen, a mnohých
ďalších.. Sme občianske združenie, založené Matúšom Izakovičom, a našou myšlienkou
je priniesť multimediálnu show a zážitky využívajúc moderné audiovizuálne technológie.
Lovely Experience sme organizovali 4x a tento krát sme si pre Vás pripravili
niečo špeciálne. Vytvárame jedinečný festival, ktorý umožňuje zažiť obrovskú párty
na trnavskom námestí – tento krát bezplatne. Toto je Vaša jedinečná šanca byť
jej súčasťou. Nezmeškajte ju!


Prinášame jedinečný koncept overený časom.. Tento krát na
kultovom mieste a pre všetkých zadarmo!


Prečo je pre nás Vaša podpora dôležitá a ako vyzbieranú
sumu použijeme?
Sme exkluzívny event financovaný 100 % z partnerov a sponzorov.
Náš inovatívny prístup nám pomáha vytvoriť priestor pre spoluprácu. Kladieme dôraz
na moderné technológie! Prinášajú zaujímavé a vysoko kvalitné vystúpenia.
S vami sme pripravení to všetko pripraviť a zvládnuť!

Čo, ak nám nemôžete poskytnúť finančný príspevok?
Ak nás nemôžete podporiť finančne, veľmi oceníme Vašu pomoc,
keď budete našu kampaň zdieľať prostredníctvom sociálnych sietí. Povedzte o nás
svojim kamarátom a pomôžte nám rozšíriť našu myšlienku multimediálnej show
do celého sveta. Pridajte sa k nám!

''Jedine Lovely Experience Vám umožní takto
sa prezentovať....''
Zaujali sme Vás, však? ;)
Navštívte náš web: http://www.lovelyexperience.sk/
Pozrite si náš Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lovely.experience?fref=ts

Poďme spolu zdieľať Lovely Experience!

story:
Sweden is known for many musicians and bands that have taken over the world. But never have any swedish person done anything original in a long time, as having the idea of bringing Corey Feldman to a Sweden Tour with his unique band Coreys Angels. This campaign is made to make this possible to happen, since it will cost to arrange a tour and make sure the band is paid.

So what will we give back to the fans?

Concert tickets of course including t shirts, signed pictures of the band, meet Coreys Angels backstage, and other nice stuff. This can only happen with your help, depending on how many shows we can arrange. I hope you are all excited as i am about this project. The money will be used to pay the band,  to the concert locations that i can find and for other expenses that will be included in this wonderful campaign.  I hope you share the vision as me and Corey Feldman does. 

Cheers from Daniel

story:
It's Extreme Home Makeover - Mexico Edition!

A group of 30 of us will swoop into Maneadero in Baja, Mexico for a whirlwind 3.5 day trip. When we arrive a family will be living in a home pieced together with cardboard, scrap lumber, sticks and plastic sheeting. They will be living without electricity, water, or sanitation. Their average wage will be $160 per month and they will be spending half of that to make payments on the small piece of land that they own .... practically the only thing they own. 

Three and a half days later, they will be living in a 16' x 20' home, with three rooms and a sleeping loft, on a foundation, insulated and wired for electricity.

It only takes each one giving a little bit to make this miracle a reality.

story:
Hello!

We are Heroes Turn Human, an alternative pop punk/rock band from the Bay Area.  After recording our debut EP "Set Sail for Yesterday" last summer, we are planning to hit the studio again this summer and record number two. 

Since last year we have all evolved musically and with the upcoming EP, we hope to reflect our creative development. With your help, it will be possible for us to express ourselves through new original music, and to record these new songs for everyone to enjoy. 

The donations that you make will go toward recording time, as well as the mixing and mastering of the album.  Additional funds raised will be put toward distribution of the album and additional expenses that come with the recording process. If you are unable to make a donation, but would still like to help us put out the album, please share this link with family and friends.  We really appreciate any support. Thank you.

Sincerely, 
Heroes Turn Human

If you are unable to make a donation, but would still like to help us put out the album, please share this link with family and friends.  We really appreciate any support. Thank you.Sincerely, Heroes Turn Human

story:
Who We Are

My name is JD Gassmann and I’ve been performing music for over 30 years.  It was while performing at the Mesa Amphitheater years ago, I looked out and thought, “One day I’m going to build my own amphitheater , and so that  my community can experience the magic that happens when music and the outdoors meet.

My name is Allison Hawkins and I spent 20 years going to see live music in Austin, TX . Some of my favorite shows were the outdoor concerts.

I’ve live in Pahrump, NV too and I substitute teach at the middle school and high school.  Not having  a lot to do here, many of the young people find themselves involved in not so  good things, like drugs. We don’t even have a movie theater!

With your help,  we can provide a positive avenue for the young people of Pahrump to experience.

What We Need and What You Get

We need $10,000 to get the first phase of the project going so that we can begin putting on concerts by late July.

JD: Right now I am the owner of JDs Bar and Casino in Pahrump, NV, and have the land to build this project.

The $10,000 will be spent on this:

Clearing the land

Fencing

Permits needed

In the case we do not meet the full amount, funds will be spent to cover one of these necessary steps toward the completion of the amphitheater.

We have a variety of perks to meet every budget. The T-shirts that you will receive will be a one-time limited edition and will not be printed  again.

If you love live music, the season tickets are quite the deal. Pahrump is an hour west of Las Vegas, NV and airline tickets are very affordable.

The Impact

Both of us know that music has  had an incredible positive effect on our lives, and we want to provide that opportunity to the community of Pahrump, especially the younger population.

Once our goal is met, anything over that we will donate 10% to the local high school band boosters.

Once the Amphitheater is Built

JD: Once the amphitheater is built, because of my experience of performing and touring all over the world with bands whose name you would recognize, I have verbal agreements with several well-known bands that ready to come and perform as soon as the doors are open.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can still help immensely by sharing this post with the share links below. If you believe in the power of music and it has had a positive impact in your life, be part of making that happen for the future generation in Pahrump, NV. Thank you for whatever contribution you can make.

story:
Aaaahhhh, but the power and delight of the Bhakti path!  

Little did I know how seven years ago, this path would pick me up and set me back down in a completely new and magnificent direction.  From the moment I magically discovered a flyer for the very first BhaktiFest in my car, my soul’s calling began to unfold.  I will never forget my heart opening tears which literally brought me to my knees, being amongst so many beautiful like-minded souls, all singing and dancing our hearts out to the Mother.  From then on, I could not envision a life without singing the Divine Names, yet Kirtan offerings at this time were beyond minimal in Sedona.  Wondering if this would mean that I might have to move back to California, I had a sudden realization that I could instead be bringing Kirtan to Sedona.  If through my events, even one person felt a tremendous heart-opening like I had, my dharma would have felt realized.  I was on a mantra mission and thus Bhakti Tribe Sedona was born.  

After a time, I was surprised to feel my heart burn with love every time I thought about the harmonium.  It was clear to me that my soul was calling me to play this deeply soul-stirring instrument. I decided to sign up for my first Kirtan camp with my most beloved Kirtan artist, Jai Uttal. Harmonium in hand, I bravely yet shakily faced that terrifying first time leading Kirtan at that retreat!  My intent was to develop my own personal chanting practice, immersing myself deeper into this sweet nectar of devotion.  Then, about a year later, I heard whisperings that it was time to expand beyond my personal practice.   

And thus Sanjali Kirtan was birthed.

Prior to BhaktiFest, if anyone had told me that I was going to be singing in public regularly and was going to record a CD, I probably would have laughed them out the door.  Yet, here I am, offering Kirtan on a regular basis and bringing devotional chanting and teachings about the deities to yoga classes.  This has been soul-fulfilling beyond measure and now I am hearing the divine whisperings that a CD is asking to be born.  

I come before you, asking for your financial generosity in order to embark on the recording, mixing, mastering, printing and packaging of my first CD, bringing forth the songs of my heart.

My eternal gratitude to each and every one of you who is so great-heartedly choosing to support this divinely guided project.

I would love for you to share this campaign with your community on FaceBook, if you feel called.

With Love,

Valerie

story:
L'Orchestra Giovanile Napolinova

Marzo 2014, Il Maestro Mariano Patti ed io abbiamo deciso di trasformare il ”sogno” di creare a Napoli un’orchestra giovanile di alto livello. Un'orchestra che si ponesse come fine il dare ai tanti giovani talenti la possibilità di realizzare le proprie aspirazioni e sviluppare la propria professionalità. 

Un progetto in cui sarebbero stati il “fine” e non il “mezzo”.

In quella data non eravamo certi di nulla, se non della nostra esperienza nel mondo musicale e nelle sue problematiche. 

Eravamo coscienti delle difficoltà che avremmo incontrato. 

Per realizzare questo sogno il primo passo è stato quello di indire “regolari audizioni” con una commissione di alto livello che ha selezionato giovani provenienti da tutta Italia.

Novembre 2014, finalmente siamo riusciti a realizzare con grande successo il nostro primo evento. Li abbiamo anche capito che potevamo contare sulla voglia dei giovani di trovare il loro spazio e sulla voglia di tanti, musicisti ma anche persone dalle più disparate professionalità, di partecipare e contribuire ad un progetto che andava oltre la musica.

Clicca per ascoltare: Mozart: Sinf. in La Magg. K 201 n. 29

In questo primo anno di vita, grazie all'impegno qualitativo e professionale dei ragazzi abbiamo già realizzato tanto.


I ragazzi hanno condiviso e scelto di investire in questo sogno e siamo riusciti, senza nessun aiuto, a realizzare una serie di eventi di grande spessore. 

Le persone ci hanno dato grande supporto, riuscendo a metterci subito in luce come una realtà nuova, non solo nei presupposti. 

La loro spinta ci ha permesso di emergere inserendoci in rassegne di alto profilo al fianco di prestigiosi nomi del concertismo italiano.



Siamo stati invitati con grande successo al “Moz’art Box” 2015


abbiamo inaugurato lo scorso luglio la XVIII edizione della rassegna “I Concerti di Villa Guariglia” 


e, infine, grazie alla collaborazione di Antonio Pompa-Baldi, pianista di fama mondiale e docente alla Cleveland University abbiamo partecipato come orchestra ospite al TIMM (Todi International Music Master), Festival internazionale, dove i giovani strumentisti dell’Orchestra hanno potuto collaborare con alcuni dei più famosi docenti delle più importanti università americane, suonando con giovani pianisti provenienti da tutto il mondo (Cina, Giappone, USA, Svezia).


Antonio Pompa-Baldi ha creduto e investito con noi nel progetto dando all'Orchestra una grande opportunità, speriamo che anche voi abbiate la stessa voglia di contribuire e investire su questi ragazzi. 

qui il link al tributo ricevuto a todi 

https://www.facebook.com/alfredodepascale62/videos/395762387289685/

Cosa vogliamo realizzare

Prossimo passo nella costruzione di questo sogno è la produzione di una prima stagione concertistica stabile da gennaio a maggio, con produzioni mensili che, oltre a Napoli, saranno proposte in altri importanti centri della Campania.

Il goal è riuscire a fare 14 concerti.


Ancora una volta la nostra “follia” ha trovato supporto in tanti artisti di fama internazionale, pronti a contribuire alla nostra prima stagione.

Tra questi Felice Cusano, docente e solista di fama internazionale, che ha creato tanti dei più importanti violinisti italiani e preparato le più importanti Orchestre Giovanili Italiane, il fagottista Francesco Bossone, solista dell’Orchestra dell’Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia, che collaborerà da solista e direttore, mettendo al servizio dei giovani la sua bravura e la sua esperienza, il violista Raffaele Mallozzi, anch’egli solista dell’Orchestra dell’Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia, i pianisti Orazio Maione e Alexander Hintchev, il violinista Franco Mezzena, concertista di fama internazionale, il violoncellista Ilie Ionescu, primo violoncello dell’Orchestra del Teatro San Carlo e solista di fama, l’oboista Fabio D’Onofrio, solista dei Wiener Akademie e tra i più bravi oboisti italiani.

La lista di quelli che hanno dato la loro gratuita disponibilità potrebbe continuare a lungo, ma vogliamo che anche tu, ascoltando le parole dei nostri giovani, ascoltando su Youtube le performance e leggendo le recensioni abbia voglia di far parte di questo sogno. 

clicca per ascoltare: Tchaikovsky Serenata opera 48 per archi


Che tu sia un musicista, un appassionato o anche una persona lontana dal mondo musicale ma amante del bello. 

Credere che la passione e la volontà possano far nascere progetti "impossibili" e che il futuro sia nelle mani di tutti noi.




Oggi siamo in una delle fasi più critiche per il mondo della musica classica, per mille motivi che non sto qui ad elencare. Dare un futuro a questo patrimonio dell’umanità e a tutti quei ragazzi che, ancora oggi, nella musica classica investono la loro vita è la nostra scelta.

Questo impegno, oggi nell'era della globalizzazione, puo' superare i confini nazionali e noi, proprio per questo, ci rivolgiamo a tutti coloro che, di qualsiasi nazione siano, si sentano uniti da questo comune ideale, che vada oltre la musica e sia nella passione e nella voglia di costruire qualcosa con le proprie forze.

Anche se distante migliaia di chilometri da noi, puoi essere partecipe e protagonista del progetto. La musica unisce ed azzera le distanze. 

clicca per ascoltare: Elgar "Serenata" opera 20


Perchè il crowdfunding

Fino ad oggi i ragazzi hanno investito il loro tempo, noi le nostre poche risorse per sviluppare tutto quanto hai visto nell'anno appena trascorso, Grazie al contributo alcuni nostri appassionati amici l'Orchestra è stata "adottata" per qualche concerto nella scorsa stagione.

Preparare un concerto richiede tante ore di studio e luoghi adeguati per provare. I maggiori costi che dovremo sostenere sono:

  • Rimborso spese per i ragazzi durante le prove
  • Rimborso spese di viaggio e pernottamento per i solisti invitati 
  • Creazione di materiale informativo per i concerti

Vogliamo renderli protagonisti di una vera stagione concertistica, con il tuo aiuto.

Abbiamo costruito tante ricompense per dirti grazie. Scorri la barra alla destra per scegliere la tua.

Puoi dare il tuo aiuto cliccando sulla ricompensa (perks) scelta e seguendo le indicazioni oppure con un semplice bonifico su

Associazione Napolinova - Banca Prossima

IBAN: IT97M0335901600100000001709

Scrivendo nella causale:

"libera donazione per il Crowdfunding dell'Orchestra Giovanile Napolinova"

Unisciti a noi in questo “sogno” e aiutaci a realizzare la nostra prima stagione concertistica.

Se vuoi puoi dare il tuo contributo anche ...

IBAN:  IT97M0335901600100000001709

Scrivendo nella causale:

"libera donazione per il Crowdfunding dell'Orchestra Giovanile Napolinova"



Grazie per l'attenzione.

Alfredo de Pascale e Mariano Patti




The Youth Orchestra Napolinova

In March 2014 the conductor Mariano Patti and I decided to make our dream come true: to create a young high level orchestra in Naples. This in order to provide many young talents with the opportunity to express and reach their professional aims. 

Musicians are the key players in this project.

At that time we had no guarantees; we only had our music experience with us and were conscious of the troubles we’d face.

To realize this dream the first step was to hold "regular auditions" with a high level jury which selected young people from across Italy.

At last, in November 2014, we realized our first event with great success. Then, we also understood that we could trust our young people’s desire of self-assertion and that many other people, not necessarily musicians, wanted to be part of and share a project beyond the music.

Click to play: Mozart: Sinf. in La Magg. K 201 n. 29

Much has been done during the past first year, thanks to the orchestra people’s involvement and support.

The young musicians have chosen to join and share the dream, and all together we have developed several very important events.

People’s great support has highlighted the orchestra as a really new entity.

Due to their drive, the orchestra has been invited in high-profile festivals, together with many Italian distinguished musicians.



In 2015 we have been invited at the "Moz'art Box" and performed with great success. 



In July we opened the eighteenth edition of "The Concerts at Villa Guariglia" 


and, lastly, thanks to the collaboration of Antonio Pompa-Baldi, the world-famous pianist and professor at the University of Cleveland,  the orchestra has taken part, as a guest, at the festival “Todi International Music Master” (TIMM). Here the orchestra young musicians have collaborated with very famous teachers coming from the most important American universities, and have collaborated with young pianists coming from all over the world (China, Japan, USA, Sweden).


Antonio Pompa-Baldi has believed and invested with us in the project giving the orchestra a great opportunity. We hope that you also have the same desire to contribute and invest in these youngsters.

Here is the link to the tribute received in Todi

https://www.facebook.com/alfredodepascale62/videos/395762387289685/

Which is our goal?

Our next step is to develop of a concert season between January and May 2016: monthly events will be presented in Naples and in other important sites in Campania.

Producing 14 concerts is our target.

Once again many world famous artists have been prompt to give their contribution to our “folly”.

Among these, Felice Cusano, soloist and teacher of the best Italian violinists, who has trained the most important Italian orchestras; the bassoonist Francesco Bossone, soloist of the “Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia”, will cooperate as an experienced and skilled soloist and conductor; the violinist Raffaele Mallozzi, from the “Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia” as well; the pianists Orazio Maione and Alexander Hintchev, the violinist Franco Mezzena; Ilie Ionescu, the first cellist (and soloist) of the “Orchestra del Teatro San Carlo”; the oboist Fabio D’Onofrio, soloist of the “Wiener Akademie”.

click to play: Tchaikovsky Serenata opera 48 per archi

The list could be long, but we wish you really want to join this dream, after listening to our young musicians and to the orchestra’s performance on YouTube, and reading the concert reviews. 

And this, whether you are a musician or only keen on music, or even a person simply looking for beauty.

We believe that passion and will can result in “impossible” projects and that the future is in in our own hands.



Risks and opportunities

Nowadays classical music goes through a critical phase for many reasons we don’t want to list.

We have chosen to build a future for this world heritage and for many young people who devote their entire life to the classical music.

Here and now this task can cross the national boundaries and that’s why we address all those people from all over the world who really feel this common desire.

Music connects people and makes distance null: so you can join in the project and play a key role even if you are thousand kilometers far.

here you can listen us play Elgar


Why crowdfunding

Up to now we and the orchestra young musicians have been investing time and resources to develop last year’s events.

Some enthusiastic friends have granted several concerts in the past season, thus “adopting” the Orchestra.

A concert setup is very demanding in terms of study hours and proper rehearsal locations for the rehearsals.

The main expenses are:

-  refunding musicians’ rehearsals;

-  refunding musicians’ travel and overnight stay;

-  publishing and distributing informative for the concerts;

With your help we want a really stable concert season for the orchestra young musicians.

We have many rewards to thank you. Scroll the bar on the right to make your choice.

Join us in this dream and help us to realize the first concert season.

We wish to thank you for the attention.


Alfredo de Pascale and Mariano Patti
story_txt:
L'Orchestra Giovanile Napolinova 
Marzo 2014, Il Maestro Mariano Patti ed io abbiamo deciso di trasformare il ”sogno” di creare a Napoli un’orchestra giovanile di alto livello. Un'orchestra che si ponesse come fine il dare ai tanti giovani talenti la possibilità di realizzare le proprie aspirazioni e sviluppare la propria professionalità. Un progetto in cui sarebbero stati il “fine” e non il “mezzo”.In quella data non eravamo certi di nulla, se non della nostra esperienza nel mondo musicale e nelle sue problematiche. Eravamo coscienti delle difficoltà che avremmo incontrato. Per realizzare questo sogno il primo passo è stato quello di indire “regolari audizioni” con una commissione di alto livello che ha selezionato giovani provenienti da tutta Italia.Novembre 2014, finalmente siamo riusciti a realizzare con grande successo il nostro primo evento. Li abbiamo anche capito che potevamo contare sulla voglia dei giovani di trovare il loro spazio e sulla voglia di tanti, musicisti ma anche persone dalle più disparate professionalità, di partecipare e contribuire ad un progetto che andava oltre la musica.Clicca per ascoltare: Mozart: Sinf. in La Magg. K 201 n. 29In questo primo anno di vita, grazie all'impegno qualitativo e professionale dei ragazzi abbiamo già realizzato tanto.I ragazzi hanno condiviso e scelto di investire in questo sogno e siamo riusciti, senza nessun aiuto, a realizzare una serie di eventi di grande spessore. Le persone ci hanno dato grande supporto, riuscendo a metterci subito in luce come una realtà nuova, non solo nei presupposti. La loro spinta ci ha permesso di emergere inserendoci in rassegne di alto profilo al fianco di prestigiosi nomi del concertismo italiano.Siamo stati invitati con grande successo al “Moz’art Box” 2015abbiamo inaugurato lo scorso luglio la XVIII edizione della rassegna “I Concerti di Villa Guariglia” 
e, infine, grazie alla collaborazione di Antonio Pompa-Baldi, pianista di fama mondiale e docente alla Cleveland University abbiamo partecipato come orchestra ospite al TIMM (Todi International Music Master), Festival internazionale, dove i giovani strumentisti dell’Orchestra hanno potuto collaborare con alcuni dei più famosi docenti delle più importanti università americane, suonando con giovani pianisti provenienti da tutto il mondo (Cina, Giappone, USA, Svezia).Antonio Pompa-Baldi ha creduto e investito con noi nel progetto dando all'Orchestra una grande opportunità, speriamo che anche voi abbiate la stessa voglia di contribuire e investire su questi ragazzi. 
qui il link al tributo ricevuto a todi 
https://www.facebook.com/alfredodepascale62/videos/395762387289685/Cosa vogliamo realizzareProssimo passo nella costruzione di questo sogno è la produzione di una prima stagione concertistica stabile da gennaio a maggio, con produzioni mensili che, oltre a Napoli, saranno proposte in altri importanti centri della Campania.Il goal è riuscire a fare 14 concerti.
Ancora una volta la nostra “follia” ha trovato supporto in tanti artisti di fama internazionale, pronti a contribuire alla nostra prima stagione.
Tra questi Felice Cusano, docente e solista di fama internazionale, che ha creato tanti dei più importanti violinisti italiani e preparato le più importanti Orchestre Giovanili Italiane, il fagottista Francesco Bossone, solista dell’Orchestra dell’Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia, che collaborerà da solista e direttore, mettendo al servizio dei giovani la sua bravura e la sua esperienza, il violista Raffaele Mallozzi, anch’egli solista dell’Orchestra dell’Accademia Nazionale di Santa Cecilia, i pianisti Orazio Maione e Alexander Hintchev, il violinista Franco Mezzena, concertista di fama internazionale, il violoncellista Ilie Ionescu, primo violoncello dell’Orchestra del Teatro San Carlo e solista di fama, l’oboista Fabio D’Onofrio, solista dei Wiener Akademie e tra i più bravi oboisti italiani.La lista di quelli che hanno dato la loro gratuita disponibilità potrebbe continuare a lungo, ma vogliamo che anche tu, ascoltando le parole dei nostri giovani, ascoltando su Youtube le performance e leggendo le recensioni abbia voglia di far parte di questo sogno. clicca per ascoltare: Tchaikovsky Serenata opera 48 per archiChe tu sia un musicista, un appassionato o anche una persona lontana dal mondo musicale ma amante del bello. Credere che la passione e la volontà possano far nascere progetti "impossibili" e che il futuro sia nelle mani di tutti noi.Oggi siamo in una delle fasi più critiche per il mondo della musica classica, per mille motivi che non sto qui ad elencare. Dare un futuro a questo patrimonio dell’umanità e a tutti quei ragazzi che, ancora oggi, nella musica classica investono la loro vita è la nostra scelta.Questo impegno, oggi nell'era della globalizzazione, puo' superare i confini nazionali e noi, proprio per questo, ci rivolgiamo a tutti coloro che, di qualsiasi nazione siano, si sentano uniti da questo comune ideale, che vada oltre la musica e sia nella passione e nella voglia di costruire qualcosa con le proprie forze.Anche se distante migliaia di chilometri da noi, puoi essere partecipe e protagonista del progetto. La musica unisce ed azzera le distanze. clicca per ascoltare: Elgar "Serenata" opera 20
Perchè il crowdfunding
Fino ad oggi i ragazzi hanno investito il loro tempo, noi le nostre poche risorse per sviluppare tutto quanto hai visto nell'anno appena trascorso, Grazie al contributo alcuni nostri appassionati amici l'Orchestra è stata "adottata" per qualche concerto nella scorsa stagione.Preparare un concerto richiede tante ore di studio e luoghi adeguati per provare. I maggiori costi che dovremo sostenere sono:
Rimborso spese per i ragazzi durante le prove

Rimborso spese di viaggio e pernottamento per i solisti invitati 

Creazione di materiale informativo per i concerti
Vogliamo renderli protagonisti di una vera stagione concertistica, con il tuo aiuto.Abbiamo costruito tante ricompense per dirti grazie. Scorri la barra alla destra per scegliere la tua.Puoi dare il tuo aiuto cliccando sulla ricompensa (perks) scelta e seguendo le indicazioni oppure con un semplice bonifico su
Associazione Napolinova - Banca ProssimaIBAN:  
IT97M0335901600100000001709
Scrivendo 
nella causale:
"libera 
donazione per il Crowdfunding dell'Orchestra Giovanile 
Napolinova"Unisciti a noi in questo “sogno” e aiutaci a realizzare la nostra prima stagione concertistica.Se vuoi puoi dare il tuo contributo anche ...IBAN:  IT97M0335901600100000001709Scrivendo nella causale:"libera donazione per il Crowdfunding dell'Orchestra Giovanile Napolinova"Grazie per l'attenzione.Alfredo de Pascale e Mariano Patti

story:
Bride if you do not know them are one of the first Christian Metal bands to be recognized in their genre of music. Bride was a band for over 30 years and won 4 Dove awards the equivalent of a Grammy. This release 'Silence Is Madness" is long out of print and is being repressed by Blastzone Entertainment for the first time in 30 some years. "Silence Is Madness" will be released with 12 songs including the demos "Dirty", "Good Rock "N" Roll" and "Help". There will only be 500 copies pressed on mixed vinyl.


"Silence Is Madness"

Side A

1.  Fool Me Once

2.  Hot Down South

3.  Silence Is Madness

4.  Until The End We Rock

5.  Evil Dreams

6.  Under The Influence

Side B

1.  All Hallow's Eve

2.  No More Nightmares

3.  Rock Those Blues Away

4.  Dirty (Demo)

5.  Good Rock ‘N’ Roll (Demo

6.  Help (Demo)


Blastzone Entertainment has the rights to release the entire Bride catalog on vinyl over the next 2 years. We are starting with "Show No Mercy", "Live To Die" and "Silence Is Madness". 


Silence is Madness is the third album by the American heavy metal band Bride, released in 1989. This was the last album in the band's metal era, as the band began writing more commercial hard rock on the following releases. On Silence is Madness, Bride also tried to achieve crossover success to the secular market.


For more information on this release or any future releases please contact Blastzone Entertainment at blastzoneentertainment@yahoo.com

story:
Short Summary

On October 10th, 2015, from noon to 11pm, The Oldtone Roots Music Festival will feature an impressive lineup of Cajun, Swing Jazz, Old-Time, and Bluegrass bands at the Lantern Inn in Wassaic, NY. A family style one-day festival with street vendors, an old-time fiddle & banjo workshop, children's entertainment and more, is sure to be a hit for music lovers of all ages and backgrounds.

The OT '15 lineup:


    JESSE LEGE & BAYOU BREW
    BRUCE MOLSKY
    MOONSHINE HOLLER
    THE STUART BROTHERS
    THE LUCKY FIVE
    THE EASY RIDIN’ PAPAS
    THE BASH BISH BLUEGRASS BAND

Taking place outside the Lantern Inn in Wassaic, NY, this event will take on the air of the street fes- tival. The beloved bar and wood-fire pizza will be open and ready to serve. Just out the doors of the bar will be a host of other vendors selling an array of food and other goods, tents, vintage record DJs, and a hay-wagon stage featuring some of the finest local roots music and headlining acts coming from as far as Louisiana and North Carolina!

What We Need & What You Get

We are pleased to bring the 1st Annual Oldtone Music festival to Wassaic, NY October 10th 2015, noon-11:00pm, featuring a host of regional and internationally recognized Roots-based bands alongside street venders in and outside at the Lantern Inn in beautiful downtown Wassaic. We believe this kind of event offers a culturally educational and enriching experience for the local community and in turn helps support and preserve these important American roots art forms.

It will not surprise you to learn that the funds required to put on a festival of this scope and nature are varied and plenty. The money raised through ticket sales, advertising, donations and festival merchandise will go to the following big-ticket items:

• Artists/bands
• Sound Company/Engineer
• Oldtone Music Festival Staff
• Advertising
• Printing cost including posters, handbills, programs, tickets, wristbands, t-shirts
• Web/digital costs including website production & hosting, digital ad graphics
• Shade/rain tent
• Port-a-Johns

In addition to all of this, there are countless small items that continue to rear their ugly little heads along the way!

The Impact

The Oldtone Roots Music Festival  is sure to enrich the community in an inclusive and family-friendly way. To be a part of helping continue the tradition of live music, live American roots musicians, is an honor we have yet to realize in it's fullest. It is our hope that we can inspire others who have yet to 'discover' some of these amazing musicians and styles of music.

Risks & Challenges

Clearly our biggest challenge is in promoting our festival. We have secured an incredible venue, the historic Lantern Inn, in Wassaic, NY. We have also put together what we believe to be an AMAZING LINEUP OF BANDS!


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone is in a financial place to contribute with money. There are other ways we could use your support. One of the biggest contributions is to shout out to everyone you know that you just heard about this amazing roots music festival called The Oldtone Roots Music Festival happening on Saturday, October 10th from Noon to 11pm in Wassaic, NY at the historic Lantern Inn! You can lend a huge hand simply by making some noise on our behalf!!!.

story:
Registered charity Educate the World [UK] [registered charity: 1137077] in association with Iridaceae Records, will be releasing a compilation CD of tracks recorded by independent classical-crossover artists from around the world in 2016.  We believe this will be one of, if not, the largest collaboration of independent classical-crossover artists ever on a single project.  The following artists have already indicated they would like to be involved: 

UK:

Mary-Jess Leaverland
Scarlett Soprano Quigley
Mariette Davina
Joanna Forest
Samantha Link
Classical Reflection
Il Tenore
Hercules Smith
Hege Kristoffersen
Jennifer Coleman
Rhiannon Lambert
Bruce Anderson
Charlie Alexander Botting
Danielle Louise Thomas
Gari Glaysher
Hayley Griffiths
Phillippa Lusty
Forest
Beth Ford

Ireland:

Affiniti

Sweden:

Viktoria Tocca

Malta:

Rachel Fabri

Australia:

Grace Bawden
Dione Baker
Kathleen Moore
Kylee Kate Sargant
Clara Helms

NZ:

Tayla Alexander
Toni Gibson

Canada:

Alessandra Paonessa
Sophie Keats
Tiffany Desrosiers

US:

Micheal Castaldo
Molly Hardy Bohman
Anastasia Lee
Marisa Johnson
Kristyn Murphy
Agne Giedraityte
Jennifer Thomas
Abbie Stands
Brooke Falls
Elena House
Francesca Sola

Russia:

Natalia Krishtopets

Indonesia:

Birgitta Sisca


The purpose of this crowdfunding campaign is to raise money to cover the pre-release costs of the CD in order that the money raised from the sale of the CD will support Educate the World [UK]'s work to reduce the number of out of school children in both developed and developing countries.  The CD will be released in both digital and physical formats.

Note: Artist list is subject to change.
story_txt: Registered charity Educate the World [UK] [registered charity: 1137077] in association with Iridaceae Records, will be releasing a compilation CD of tracks recorded by independent classical-crossover artists from around the world in 2016.  We believe this will be one of, if not, the largest collaboration of independent classical-crossover artists ever on a single project.  The following artists have already indicated they would like to be involved: UK:Mary-Jess LeaverlandScarlett Soprano QuigleyMariette DavinaJoanna ForestSamantha Link Classical ReflectionIl TenoreHercules SmithHege KristoffersenJennifer Coleman Rhiannon LambertBruce AndersonCharlie Alexander BottingDanielle Louise ThomasGari GlaysherHayley GriffithsPhillippa Lusty Forest Beth Ford Ireland:Affiniti Sweden:Viktoria Tocca Malta: Rachel Fabri Australia:Grace BawdenDione BakerKathleen MooreKylee Kate Sargant Clara Helms NZ: Tayla AlexanderToni Gibson Canada:Alessandra PaonessaSophie KeatsTiffany Desrosiers US:Micheal CastaldoMolly Hardy BohmanAnastasia LeeMarisa Johnson Kristyn Murphy Agne GiedraityteJennifer ThomasAbbie Stands Brooke FallsElena HouseFrancesca Sola Russia:Natalia Krishtopets Indonesia:Birgitta SiscaThe purpose of this crowdfunding campaign is to raise money to cover the pre-release costs of the CD in order that the money raised from the sale of the CD will support Educate the World [UK]'s work to reduce the number of out of school children in both developed and developing countries.  The CD will be released in both digital and physical formats.Note: Artist list is subject to change.

story:
"THANK YOU , THANK YOU - THANK YOU KINDLY"
TO ALL WHO CONTRIBUTED!
If you missed the deadline, donations are still being accepted and can be mailed directly to St. Paul's Lutheran Church, 440 Hoboken Ave, Jersey City.
Blessed Holidays to all.  And now, on with the show!

*****

My Music Garden is raising funds to bring the beloved children’s opera Amahl and the Night Visitors to the Jersey City community for the very first time! December 20th, 2015  at St. Paul's Lutheran Church, Jersey City

Meet Amahl. A 12 year old boy who prefers to play his flute than do his chores, who sometimes gets himself into trouble and doesn’t always listen to his mother. He is a boy with a special gift and his life will be changed by 3 special visitors.

Meet Alexi. A 12 year old boy who lives in Jersey City, attends 7th Grade, plays basketball, doesn’t care for homework all that much, enjoys his video games, in many ways just an ordinary boy. He is also a boy who loves to sing.

Alexi has been getting to know Amahl.

He would like to share with you Amahl’s beautiful story.

***

FIRST STEP GOAL: $12,000

This is the minimum we need to put on this production. This amount will pay 80% of production costs, including a cast of professional opera singers from Kyrenia Opera, stage director, conductor, chorus, dancer, dance choreographer and piano accompaniment.  Balance of 20% is being matched by a private sponsor upon meeting our first step goal.

FULL SUCCESS GOAL: $20,000

Anything we raise above our first step goal will go towards the hiring of an instrumental ensemble. The full success goal of $20,000 will enable us to have a full orchestra!

***

Kyrenia Opera’s semi-staged production will feature professional opera singers and dancers, as well as our homegrown Jersey City boy Alexi Horne. But what’s a children’s opera without plenty of children? So, this unique production will also offer an interactive component: children from the Jersey City community who love to sing and dance will participate in the opera!  (Inquiries may be sent to AmahlJerseyCity2015@gmail.com)

We can all relate to the heartwarming, compassionate tale of Amahl and the Night Visitors, the beloved short one-act opera by Gian Carlo Menotti. Whether we celebrate Christmas or not, the characters are still alive today in all of us:

     anguished, loving mothers and fathers,
     mischievous but brave young sons and daughters,
     communities dancing and feasting joyfully even in the face of adversity,
     and leaders in pursuit of their mission guided by wisdom, compassion and truth.

The warm, intimate setting of historic St. Paul’s Lutheran Church in urban, diverse Jersey City is the ideal place to nourish ourselves with the simple truths and timeless values found in the story of Amahl and the Night Visitors.

Please contribute at any level that you can.

And most of all, don’t miss this truly special event!

Tickets are also available for $35 at
http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/2461185

***

* The “Gift of Love” Community-Outreach Program

Any gift of $100 or above supports the “Gift of Love” program”, a program designed for those who would like to attend the production of Amahl and the Night Visitors in Jersey City, but may not be able to afford the tickets.

Tickets will be distributed in advance at the discretion of My Music Garden and St. Paul’s Lutheran Church. Suggestions or requests are welcome and may be sent to AmahlJerseyCity2015@gmail.com.


